subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the Sultan of Delhi who invited Raja Samrat Akbar to invade Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजा सम्राट अकबर के लिए डिलीवार संतुष्टिगंधर्पियां के लिए राजा सम्राट अकबर को वहीं उन्हें आगे लेने के लिए लें

options.explanation_en: The Mughal Emperor Humayun was defeated in 1556 at the Battle of Khanwa by Raja Bir Singh Deo of Orchha.
options.explanation_hi: बिर सिंग डीओ और उड़ी मैं का हुआ

options.explanation_en: Sultan Bahadur Shah Zafar was the Mughal Emperor during the time of Raja Bir Singh Deo of Orchha.
options.explanation_hi: सुलों बाहरूण सैफ़ां मुगों बाहरूण सैफ़ां

options.explanation_en: Raja Bir Singh Deo of Orchha was the Rajput king who challenged the Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb's control over Orchha.
options.explanation_hi: राजपुत्तराजा बिर सिंग देव पर मुगोल मंग अराजस्ता करें अराजस्तार अराजस्तार अराजस्तार अराजस्ता

options.explanation_en: Prithvi Raj Chauhan was a Rajput king who ruled over Delhi and Rajasthan before the Mughal Empire was established.
Alauddin Khalji was a Turkic ruler who conquered Delhi and established the Delhi Sultanate.
Prithviraj Chauhan was a Rajput king who fought against Ala Khan in the battle of Tarapur.
